share on x rj rev sally jury. jun 13 at 10:38 am a very sweet and loving person. our thoughts and prayers to all the family. she was one of gods instruments of love . she is his angel now. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x bt brenda treat. jun 13 at 9:18 am kevin, my condolences to you and your family for the loss of your mother. love, brenda (goodrich) treat. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... currently no events are scheduled. wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe spencer family funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
